name: examples
description: Example commands and panels demonstrating Discord.js features (ping, buttons, modals, dropdowns, panels)
author: kriz_cold

configSchema.name: Examples Module Config
configSchema.description: Configuration for example commands and features

ping.enableLatencyDisplay.description: Show API latency in ping command responses

ping.customMessage.description: Custom message to display with ping command

ping.maxConsecutivePings.description: Maximum number of times a user can use ping in quick succession
